availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Hinds (Estill County, Kentucky, saddler)

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, saddler. Kentucky native. Married to Sally Hinds. Saddler in Estill County in 1860. Saddler in Estill County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Irvine, p. 275.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Irvine, p. 277.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Estill County, KY, July 1863, p. 62.
